master.title: Fix Login Screen Loading Issue
master.description: Resolve the issue where login screen doesn't load in web browser due to Expo SDK 51 compatibility
master.details: The login screen fails to load due to _expoModulesCore.registerWebModule error. Solution implemented with polyfill in App.tsx and platform-specific protections.
master.testStrategy: Test on web browser (localhost:8081), verify login screen appears, check console for errors

subtasks.title: Protect Google Sign-In for web platform

master.title: Implement Authentication System
master.description: Complete authentication flow with email/password and Google Sign-In
master.details: Implement JWT-based authentication with backend integration. Support both email/password and Google Sign-In methods.
master.testStrategy: Test login/signup flows, verify token storage, test session persistence

master.title: Create Workout Management System
master.description: Build complete workout CRUD functionality with categories and templates
master.details: Users should be able to create, edit, duplicate, and delete workouts. Include categorization by muscle groups and workout types.
master.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations, verify data persistence, test offline functionality

master.title: Build Exercise Library
master.description: Create comprehensive exercise database with Brazilian Portuguese names
master.details: 200+ exercises with categories, muscle groups, equipment requirements, and instructions. Use Brazilian Portuguese names like Supino Reto, Agachamento, etc.
master.testStrategy: Verify exercise data completeness, test search functionality, validate Portuguese translations

master.title: Integrate ExerciseDB API with Custom Videos
master.description: Integrate ExerciseDB API (5000+ exercises) with custom video upload system for personal trainers
master.details: Implement hybrid exercise system combining ExerciseDB API with custom video uploads. Features: RapidAPI integration, offline cache, GIF+MP4 player, trainer-student video assignments, search by body part/equipment, Portuguese exercise names.
master.testStrategy: Test API integration, verify video upload/playback, test offline functionality, validate cache system

subtasks.title: Add offline sync and preload functionality

master.title: Implement Workout Timer
master.description: Create timer system with rest periods, notifications, and background support
master.details: Timer should track sets/reps, rest periods between sets, provide audio/vibration notifications, and work in background.
master.testStrategy: Test timer accuracy, verify background functionality, test notifications on different devices

master.title: Create Progress Tracking System
master.description: Build comprehensive progress tracking with charts and analytics
master.details: Track weight progression, volume calculations, personal records, body measurements, and provide visual charts.
master.testStrategy: Verify data calculations, test chart rendering, validate historical data accuracy

master.title: Implement Data Persistence with AsyncStorage
master.description: Set up offline-first data storage and synchronization
master.details: Implement local storage for all app data using AsyncStorage, with sync mechanism for when online.
master.testStrategy: Test offline functionality, verify data persistence, test sync conflict resolution

master.title: Build Student Management for Trainers
master.description: Create system for personal trainers to manage multiple students
master.details: Allow trainers to add students, assign workouts, track progress, and communicate via WhatsApp integration.
master.testStrategy: Test student CRUD, verify workout assignment, test progress tracking per student

master.title: Optimize Performance and Bundle Size
master.description: Optimize app performance, reduce bundle size, and improve loading times
master.details: Target <50MB bundle size, <3s load time, 60fps animations, <150MB memory usage.
master.testStrategy: Measure bundle size, profile performance, test on low-end devices

master.title: Add Testing Coverage
master.description: Implement comprehensive testing strategy with unit, integration, and E2E tests
master.details: Achieve 80% code coverage with unit tests, integration tests for critical flows, E2E tests for user journeys.
master.testStrategy: Use Jest for unit tests, React Native Testing Library for components, Detox for E2E

subtasks.title: Set up Jest and testing infrastructure

master.title: Sistema de Diferenciação Personal Trainer / Aluno
master.description: Implementar interfaces e funcionalidades completamente distintas para Personal Trainer e Aluno, criando experiências otimizadas para cada tipo de usuário
master.details: Criar sistema completo de diferenciação com: roles e permissões, dashboards específicos, navegação condicional, gestão de alunos (PT), chat diferenciado, analytics por tipo, e biblioteca de conteúdo personalizada. Foco em UX otimizada para cada persona.
master.testStrategy: Testar controle de acesso, validar interfaces específicas por tipo, verificar fluxos de PT e Aluno, testar relacionamentos e permissões

subtasks.title: Sistema de Roles e Permissões
subtasks.description: Criar sistema de autorização baseado em userType com controle de acesso granular
subtasks.details: Implementar: enum UserRole (STUDENT, PERSONAL_TRAINER), função hasPermission(), middleware de autorização, sistema de guards para rotas e componentes

subtasks.title: Dashboard Diferenciado por Tipo
subtasks.description: Criar dashboards específicos para Aluno e Personal Trainer com métricas relevantes
subtasks.details: Dashboard Aluno: próximo treino, progresso semanal, metas pessoais, estatísticas próprias. Dashboard PT: resumo de alunos, métricas gerais, alertas, próximas sessões

subtasks.title: Navegação Condicional
subtasks.description: Implementar menus e navegação específicos baseados no tipo de usuário
subtasks.details: Menu Aluno: Início, Meus Treinos, Progresso, Chat. Menu PT: Dashboard, Alunos, Criar Treino, Relatórios, Biblioteca. BottomTabNavigator condicional com ícones e labels específicos

subtasks.title: Área de Treinos Diferenciada
subtasks.description: Funcionalidades específicas de treino para cada tipo de usuário
subtasks.details: Aluno: visualizar treinos atribuídos, timer de execução, registrar séries/repetições. PT: criar treinos, editar templates, atribuir a alunos, monitorar execução

subtasks.title: Sistema de Gestão de Alunos (Personal Trainer)
subtasks.description: Interface completa para PT gerenciar seus alunos
subtasks.details: Lista de alunos com status, adicionar/editar alunos, atribuir treinos específicos, monitorar progresso individual, notas e histórico de cada aluno

subtasks.title: Sistema de Chat e Comunicação
subtasks.description: Chat diferenciado entre PT e Aluno com funcionalidades específicas
subtasks.details: Aluno: chat 1-1 com seu personal trainer. PT: chat com múltiplos alunos, mensagens em grupo, sistema de notificações, histórico de conversas

subtasks.title: Analytics e Relatórios por Tipo
subtasks.description: Sistema de analytics adaptado para cada tipo de usuário
subtasks.details: Aluno: próprios dados de progresso, evolução pessoal, metas atingidas. PT: dashboard com métricas de todos os alunos, comparações, relatórios de desempenho, exportação de dados

subtasks.title: Biblioteca de Conteúdo Personalizada (PT)
subtasks.description: Sistema para PT criar e gerenciar conteúdo personalizado
subtasks.details: Upload de vídeos personalizados, organização por categoria, gestão de conteúdo próprio, compartilhamento com alunos específicos, biblioteca de exercícios customizados
